articles.author: Jacob Lev and Hollie Silverman, CNN
articles.title: NASCAR driver Ryan Newman says he will return to racing after crash - CNN
articles.description: NASCAR driver Ryan Newman said Sunday that he will return to racing when the season resumes after he was involved in a fiery crash during the last lap of the Daytona 500 in February.
articles.content:
I'm happy Ryan is returning to the No. 6 when NASCAR resumes. He has a wonderful team around him and it'll be great to see him back competing. 
Thanks to Jack, RFR and all their sponsors for letting me keep his seat warm while he was making his recovery.
— … [+43 chars]
